Resources

Below are some extra resources to learn about the topics we discussed. Some will be required for the HW and will be listed on the Canvas webpage, while others are left up to you!

Crash Course in Physics: Linear and Circular Motion

  1. Physics Crash Course - intro to linear motion
  2. Intro to Circular Motion and Gravitation
    • Subsection: Angular Motion Variables

Crash Course in Physics: Gravity and Circular Motion

  1. Physics Crash Course - Intro to Newton’s Law’s
  2. Physics Crash Course - Intro to Gravitation
  3. Intro to Circular Motion and Gravitation
    • Subsection: Newton’s Laws of Gravitation
  4. Another take on Circular Motion and Gravitation
  5. Newton’s First Law

Ellipses, Conic sections and Kepler’s Laws

  1. Reading from Lumen Learning
  2. Intro to Conic sections from Khan Academy
    • Subsection: Khan Academy Intro to Ellipses
  3. An intro to Kepler’s Laws - note that some of the links contain calculus derivations.
